game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the lost artifact of Eldora
game.description: Embark on an epic journey to retrieve the lost artifact of Eldora, hidden deep within the Forest of Shadows. You have been chosen by Greyson, the village elder, to bring back the artifact and restore peace in your village.

task.objective: Find the hidden map to Eldora artifact
task.description: The hidden map is said to be buried with the old queen in the Royal Cemetery. Retrieve it.

task.objective: Defeat the guardian of the Forest
task.description: At the Forest of Shadows Entrance, overcome a monstrous guardian to proceed.
Navigate through the forest using the map and avoid unexpected challenges at Heart of the Forest of Shadows.
task.location: Heart of the Forest of Shadows
